evidence.claim: MentorHealthLearning offers training on HIPAA compliance standards.
They provide courses that include FHIR and HL7 standards.
Training includes knowledge of EDI X12 transaction sets.
MentorHealthLearning incorporates various cloud services for course delivery.
They emphasize integration with health records systems.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on training rather than direct healthcare data exchanges or X12 transactions.
